Queries.AddHouse: INSERT INTO doanchuyennganh2.house(HouseId, Name, Address, WardId, Image, Longitude, Lastitude, HouseTypeId, OwnerId, CertificateOfOwnership, CreatedBy, CreateTime, UpdatedTime, DisableTime) VALUES (@HouseId, @Name, @Address, @WardId, @Image, @Longitude, @Lastitude, @HouseTypeId, @OwnerId, @CertificateOfOwnership, @CreatedBy, @CreateTime, @UpdatedTime, @DisableTime);
Queries.UpdateAllHouseById: UPDATE doanchuyennganh2.house SET Name=@Name, Address=@Address, WardId=@WardId, Image=@Image, Longitude=@Longitude, Lastitude=@Lastitude, HouseTypeId=@HouseTypeId, OwnerId=@OwnerId, CertificateOfOwnership=@CertificateOfOwnership, CreatedBy=@CreatedBy, UpdatedTime=@UpdatedTime, DisableTime=@DisableTime WHERE HouseId=@HouseId;
Queries.AddUser: INSERT INTO doanchuyennganh2.user(UserId, Email, Phone, FullName, DateOfBirth, RoleId, Image, CitizenNumber, CitizenNumberDate, Address, Gender, UniversityId, CreatedTime, LastModified) VALUES (@UserId, @Email, @Phone, @FullName, @DateOfBirth, @RoleId, @Image, @CitizenNumber, @CitizenNumberDate, @Address, @Gender, @UniversityId, @CreatedTime, @LastModified);
Queries.UpdateAllUserById: UPDATE doanchuyennganh2.user SET Phone=@Phone, FullName=@FullName, DateOfBirth=@DateOfBirth, RoleId=@RoleId, Image=@Image, CitizenNumber=@CitizenNumber, CitizenNumberDate=@CitizenNumberDate, Address=@Address, Gender=@Gender, UniversityId=@UniversityId, LastModified=@LastModified WHERE UserId=@UserId;
